Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Requires the department of corrections and community supervision to make efforts to reduce incarcerated individual telephone rates and to place a cap on the cost of outgoing calls
Summary: Requires the department of corrections and community supervision to make efforts to reduce incarcerated individual telephone rates and to place a cap on the cost of outgoing calls.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to the reduction of incarcerated individual telephone rates
